title: dress code in rr campus
content: what's the dress code in rr campus for BSc course? as a queer person this has been my major concern.  also is PES really worth for BSc psychology.

comments.body:
No dress code, dress however you like, nobody will ask. 
I’m not sure about the second question as I do not know anyone who’s taken psychology at pes. Biotech on the other hand, I’ve heard some good reviews…so that’s an option to you, you may consider

Edit: Spelling error.
It is not a school bro. no dress code. PES RR Psychology is quite good.
